name: Young Gold Dragon
movement: 40 ft. walking, 80 ft. flying, 40 ft. swimming
description: A majestic creature with radiant golden scales that shimmer, the Young Gold Dragon possesses a strong and noble demeanor.
memorable: Known for its devastating fire breath and charming presence, the dragon is a protector against evil.
goals: To defend the innocent and serve as guardians against evil.
relations: Often interacts with other dragons, both metallic and chromatic, and allies with good-aligned creatures.
environment: Typically resides near sacred sites or secluded mountains.
strengths: High Charisma and Constitution, granting it powerful spells and resilience in combat.
weaknesses: Can be threatened by more agile or cunning opponents that exploit its potential disadvantage in certain situations.
attacks: Multiattack with a bite and claws; devastating cone-shaped fire breath and weakening breath.
most_powerful_ability: Breath Weapons unleash an area attack of fire or debilitating gas.
senses: Has blindsight out to 30 feet and a keen perception modifier of +22.
skills: Possesses notable proficiency in persuasion, making it a compelling figure in social interactions.
additional_information: Can breathe both air and water, making it versatile.
Grants allies bonuses to saving throws and immunity to charms.
Capable of casting spells like Bless and Healing Word without material components.
Changes shape to a beast or humanoid, retaining hit points and abilities.
Despises cruelty and will act against injustice.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting using Charisma, able to cast Bless and Healing Word.
test_queries: fire-breathing dragon that protects the innocent
dragon that can swim and fly
magical creature that can charm enemies
powerful dragon with a devastating breath attack
